tweet: Good evening Twitterers! Phew! Finally home AND it's a Friday night! Does it get any better? At least I am off the zoo we call "trains" here
@MeMyself_Mommy Will be in my thoughts and prayers! God bless! Hope he recovers soon.
Crawling into bed with a bowl of soup, some wool and a crochet hook....not leaving bed until Monday!
Just lifted the curtains and peeked outside...turned right back around and crawled back into bed....it looks ugly out there!
